abstract_summ: The first cases of coronavirus 2019 (COVID-19) occurred in Wuhan, China, and rapidly become a public health emergency of international proportions . The disease may cause mild-to-severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and is caused by a SARS-CoV-2 virus . Olfactory dysfunction (OD)-decreased sense of smell-has been reported to occur in up to 85.6% of patients . We advise home isolation measures and/or social distancing .
